title: playground problem, not valid return as expected
body:
http://golang.org/pkg/os/exec/#example_Cmd_Output

All examples of this page, can not "Run",

2009/11/10 23:00:00 exec: "date": executable file not found in $PATH

Program exited.

2009/11/10 23:00:00 exec: "sleep": executable file not found in $PATH

Program exited.

Would you please make it run correct?
